description.en:
Landmark Tower 2 is a Grade B office building located at the heart of Jakarta's Central Business District. Landmark Tower 2 is one of two office buildings in Landmark Tower,the other being Landmark Tower 1. With a total building size of 55.000 sqm, the office building in Jl. Jend Sudirman Kav 1 is available for lease only.

Landmark Tower 2 is a tall building of 32 storeys that is of walking distance to City Walk Sudirman and Menteng Plaza. Landmark Tower 2 is equipped with 11 lifts that is split into 2 zones, namely Low Zone and High Zone, and a dedicated service lift.

Landmark Tower 2 has 2.000 parking lots to serve the office tenants and guests and ATM, Restaurant, Minimarket and Bank as facilities in the office complex.
description.id:
Landmark Tower 2 adalah bangunan kantor tipe Grade B yang terletak di Central Business District (Pusat Kawasan Bisnis), jantung kota Jakarta. Landmark Tower 2 is one of two office buildings in Landmark Tower,the other being Landmark Tower 1. Dengan total luas bangunan 55.000 m2, bangunan kantor beralamat di Jl. Jend Sudirman Kav 1 tersedia untuk sewa.

Landmark Tower 2 adalah bangunan tinggi dengan 32 lantai jarak dengan berjalan kaki City Walk Sudirman dan Menteng Plaza. Landmark Tower 2 yang dilengkapi dengan 11 lift yang dibagi menjadi 2 zona, dikenal dengan Low Zone dan High Zone, dan sebuah dedicated service lift .

Landmark Tower 2 memiliki 2.000 tempat parkir yang dapat digunakan oleh tenan dan tamu serta ATM, Restaurant, Minimarket dan Bank sebagai fasilitas di kawasan kantor.

description.en:
The Energy Tower is a Grade A office building located at the heart of Jakarta's Central Business District. With a total building size of 65.774 sqm, the office building in Jl. Jend Sudirman Kav 52 - 53 Lot 11 SCBD is available for lease only.

The Energy Tower is a tall building of 43 storeys that is of walking distance to Pacific Place and Plaza Senayan. The Energy Tower is equipped with 17 lifts that is split into 3 zones, namely Low Zone, Mid Zone and High Zone, and a dedicated service lift.

The Energy Tower has 981 parking lots to serve the office tenants and guests and ATM, Foodcourt, Restaurant and Bank as facilities in the office complex.
description.id:
The Energy Tower adalah bangunan kantor tipe Grade A yang terletak di Central Business District (Pusat Kawasan Bisnis), jantung kota Jakarta. Dengan total luas bangunan 65.774 m2, bangunan kantor beralamat di Jl. Jend Sudirman Kav 52 - 53 Lot 11 SCBD tersedia untuk sewa.

The Energy Tower adalah bangunan tinggi dengan 43 lantai jarak dengan berjalan kaki Pacific Place dan Plaza Senayan. The Energy Tower yang dilengkapi dengan 17 lift yang dibagi menjadi 3 zona, dikenal dengan Low Zone, Mid Zone dan High Zone, dan sebuah dedicated service lift .

The Energy Tower memiliki 981 tempat parkir yang dapat digunakan oleh tenan dan tamu serta ATM, Foodcourt, Restaurant dan Bank sebagai fasilitas di kawasan kantor.

description.en:
Bakrie Tower is a Grade A office building located at the heart of Jakarta's Central Business District. With a total building size of 59.404 sqm, the office building in Jl. H.R. Rasuna Said is available for strata only.

Bakrie Tower is a tall building of 47 storeys that is of walking distance to Epicentrum Walk Rasuna, Setiabudi One and Kuningan City. Bakrie Tower is equipped with 22 lifts, and a dedicated service lift and executive lift.

Bakrie Tower has ATM, Foodcourt, Restaurant, Minimarket and Bank as facilities in the office complex.
description.id:
Bakrie Tower adalah bangunan kantor tipe Grade A yang terletak di Central Business District (Pusat Kawasan Bisnis), jantung kota Jakarta. Dengan total luas bangunan 59.404 m2, bangunan kantor beralamat di Jl. H.R. Rasuna Said tersedia untuk strata.

Bakrie Tower adalah bangunan tinggi dengan 47 lantai jarak dengan berjalan kaki Epicentrum Walk Rasuna, Setiabudi One dan Kuningan City. Bakrie Tower yang dilengkapi dengan 22 lift, dan dedicated service lift dan executive lift.

Bakrie Tower memiliki ATM, Foodcourt, Restaurant, Minimarket dan Bank sebagai fasilitas di kawasan kantor.

description.en:
Gran Rubina Tower 1 is a new Grade A office building located at the heart of Jakarta's Central Business District. With a total building size of 33.660 sqm, the office building in Jl. Epicentrum Utama Raya, is available for strata only.

Gran Rubina Tower 1 is a 21 storeys office building that is of walking distance to Epicentrum Walk Rasuna, Setiabudi One and Kuningan City. Gran Rubina Tower 1 is equipped with 12 lifts that is split into 2 zones, namely Low Zone and High Zone, and a dedicated service lift and executive lift.

Gran Rubina Tower 1 has 400 parking lots to serve the office tenants and guests and ATM and Restaurant as facilities in the office complex.

Gran Rubina Tower 1 memiliki 400 tempat parkir yang dapat digunakan oleh tenan dan tamu serta ATM dan Restaurant sebagai fasilitas di kawasan kantor.

description.en:
Mega Plaza is a Grade C office building located at the heart of Jakarta's Central Business District. With a total building size of 12.783 sqm, the office building in Jl. HR. Rasuna Said Kav C3 is available for lease only.

Mega Plaza is a medium sized office building with 12 storeys that is of walking distance to Setiabudi One and Epicentrum Walk Rasuna. Mega Plaza is equipped with 5 lifts, and a dedicated service lift and executive lift.

Mega Plaza has 550 parking lots to serve the office tenants and guests and ATM and Bank as facilities in the office complex.

Telkom Landmark Tower 2 is a skyscraper of 52 storeys that is closely located to Ciputra World Jakarta, Pacific Place and Plaza Semanggi. Telkom Landmark Tower 2 is equipped with 16 lifts that is split into 2 zones, namely Low Zone and High Zone, and a dedicated service lift.

description.en:
World Trade Center 6 is an office building located at the heart of Jakarta's Central Business District. World Trade Center 6 is one of 6 in World Trade Center Complex. With a total building size of 16.000 sqm, the office building in Jl. Jend Sudirman Kav 29-30 is available for lease only.

World Trade Center 6 is a 17 storeys office building that is of walking distance to City Walk Sudirman and Plaza Semanggi. World Trade Center 6 is equipped with 7 lifts, and a dedicated service lift.

World Trade Center 6 has 2.000 parking lots to serve the office tenants and guests and Security, ATM, Foodcourt, Restaurant and Bank as facilities in the office complex.

Jend Sudirman Kav 29-30 tersedia untuk sewa.

World Trade Center 6 adalah bangunan 17 lantai jarak dengan berjalan kaki City Walk Sudirman dan Plaza Semanggi. World Trade Center 6 yang dilengkapi dengan 7 lift, dan sebuah dedicated service lift .

World Trade Center 6 memiliki 2.000 tempat parkir yang dapat digunakan oleh tenan dan tamu serta Security, ATM, Foodcourt, Restaurant dan Bank sebagai fasilitas di kawasan kantor.

description.en:
Prosperity Tower is a new Premium office building located at the heart of Jakarta's Central Business District. Prosperity Tower is one of two office buildings in District 8,the other being Treasury Tower. With a total building size of 70.950 sqm, the office building in Jl. Senopati Raya No. 8 Lot 28 is available for strata only.

Prosperity Tower is a skyscraper of 55 storeys that is of walking distance to Pacific Place and Plaza Senayan. Prosperity Tower is equipped with 17 lifts, and a dedicated service lift and executive lift.

Prosperity Tower has Restaurant as facilities in the office complex.

Senopati Raya No. 8 Lot 28 tersedia untuk strata.

Prosperity Tower adalah bangunan pencakar langit terdiri dari 55 lantai jarak dengan berjalan kaki Pacific Place dan Plaza Senayan. Prosperity Tower yang dilengkapi dengan 17 lift, dan dedicated service lift dan executive lift.

Prosperity Tower memiliki Restaurant sebagai fasilitas di kawasan kantor.

description.en:
Sequis Tower is a new Grade A office building located at the heart of Jakarta's Central Business District. With a total building size of 73.000 sqm, the office building in Jl Jend Sudirman Kav 52-53 is available for lease only.

Sequis Tower is a tall building of 39 storeys that is of walking distance to Pacific Place and Plaza Senayan. Sequis Tower is equipped with 23 lifts that is split into 3 zones, namely Low Zone, Mid Zone and High Zone , and a dedicated service lift.
